formulas.raw: Let: I_g = gross investment income, L = allowable losses, A = allowance, k = church tax rate (0, 0.08 or 0.09). We compute: $$ I_{net} = \max\bigl(0,\; I_g - L \bigr) $$ $$ B = \max\bigl(0,\; I_{net} - A \bigr) $$ $$ E = \frac{0.25 \cdot B}{1 + 0.25\cdot k} $$ $$ K = k \cdot E \quad;\quad S = 0.055 \cdot E $$ $$ T = E + K + S \quad;\quad r = \begin{cases} \dfrac{T}{B}, & B>0 \\ 0, & B=0 \end{cases} $$ E is the Abgeltungsteuer, K church tax, S solidarity surcharge, T total tax, r effective rate.
